snippet.title: Krampus is Home | Trailer 3
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/839420/Krampus_is_Home/

Krampus is Home is a survival horror game inspired by Central European folklore, where you must escape from the clutches of Krampus and other terrifying creatures. Experience intense stealth mechanics, heart-pounding action, and a chilling story that will keep you on edge.

The nightmare of Christmas is back... Are you ready to face it?
